meanings.sent1: The moneyless family struggled to make ends meet.
meanings.sent2: She lived a moneyless life, relying on the generosity of others.
meanings.sent3: The moneyless man tried to pay for his meal with a smile.
meanings.sent4: Her wallet felt as moneyless as a desert.
meanings.sent5: The moneyless situation left them feeling helpless and stressed.

meanings.sent1: The moneyless traveler couldn't afford a hotel room.
meanings.sent2: Being moneyless in a foreign country can be challenging.
meanings.sent3: The moneyless student had to get creative with budget-friendly meals.
meanings.sent4: His pockets were as moneyless as a barren field.
meanings.sent5: Living moneyless meant finding joy in simple pleasures.

meanings.sent1: The moneyless artist relied on passion to create art.
meanings.sent2: They found themselves in a moneyless situation after losing their job.
meanings.sent3: The moneyless entrepreneur turned their setback into an opportunity.
meanings.sent4: Her bank account was as moneyless as a dry well.
meanings.sent5: Being moneyless taught them the true value of friendship.
